title: How can writing an essay be helpful to us? - Quora

response.answer_text: Essay writing is an interesting task, it hones our skill-set and helps in learning something new. It is one of the most common academic writings that scholars are assigned to do. Writing essays is advantageous because it enhances our thinking, researching skills. Framing every step of the essay brings a new challenge and while solving every challenge we learn something new. Essay writing is helpful for overall development. Let me tell you how. Essay Writing Helps Us In Many Ways Not only in academics but people also write essays for various other purposes, like - publishing in newspapers or magazines, uploading the essay on online platforms, etc. No matter what is your purpose behind writing an essay, but this writing can be helpful in polishing your skills. Improves Thinking and Research Skills Before we start writing any sort of essay it is important to do in-depth research on the chosen topic and think analytically about every aspect of it. This helps in improving your research and thinking skills. We can use these qualities whenever it is required to give reasoning on any issue. Enhances Problem-solving Skills Obviously, when we write an essay either we choose our personal life incident in some forms of essays or we select any common issue that is necessary to be answered. In every type of essay, there are some of the other issues that we need to solve through our writing and for that, we need a strong problem-solving approach. While writing an essay we hone this skill that is proven beneficial for doing other tasks. Polishes Writing Skills While writing an essay we read numerous articles, essays and do a plethora of research. It is said that the more you read the better you write and the same happens in the case of essay writing. We read from various sources and fill out casket with useful works like gems and we use those words when required. It also improves our grammar and punctuation issues. There are various other benefits of essay writing that we understand when we start writing it. For scholars writing their academic essays becomes a challenging task due to lack of time, essential skills and knowledge. So, sometimes they get troubled and look for someone who can offer them essay writing help in Canada. But, I would suggest now to pay a huge amount to someone for writing your academic task. It is assigned to you for your betterment to try to do time management and work hard, I am sure you can create a masterpiece on your own.

Writing an essay is a mentally stimulating process. You first gather all the information you need. Then you work on a good opening statement, which you will support with your information. And then you arrange your information in a manner that explains your stand. You will learn a lot about the subject while digging for information. And the process of putting that information in a logical sequence will help you have a better grasp at what you have come to know. You will struggle with the writing process. You will have to pick the right phrases, choose the right words, avoid jargon and take care to explain what you know in the best way possible. You will have to write to express and not to impress. All of this requires much time and effort. And then you need to revisit your work. Keep your essay aside for some time, and go back to it later. You will find a lot of screws that need tightening up here and there. Get them in place. Do not be discouraged if you end up having to rewrite your whole essay. You will only have gained a lot more insight into the writing process by the end of it. Writing is a beautiful process. I personally like essays because they allow you to work so hard on a piece of a limited length.
